name: 吳晧霙
objective:
本課程使學生具有基礎德語能力，並加強會話及閱讀能力訓練。
The focus of this course is to enable students to have basic German abilities and to strengthen the training or drilling of conversation and reading comprehension of the German language.
schedule:
W1 Alphabet
W2 Aussprache
W3 L1
W4 L1
W5 L1
W6 L2
W7 L2
W8 L2
W9 Zwischenpruefung
W10 L3
W11 L3
W12 L4
W13 L4
W14 L5
W15 L5
W16 Film
W17 Wiederholung
W18 Endpruefung
scorePolicy:
期中口試 40%
期末口試 40%
出席 + 上課表現 20%
consultation: 本課程只限智動科學生選修
